name: MeiQi Season6
description:
[Game Features]
1. Independently develop a puzzle game
2. The scene design is carried out in a realistic style, the local customs of mainland China in the 80s and 90s
3. Original serial plot, pushing the puzzle as the basic element
4. This season inherits the first, second, third, fourth and fifth seasons of the game, and adds more new gameplay
5. This is the story of the sixth season, Enjoy!

Special note: Some scenes, objects, and placements in the game are based on online pictures. If your rights are violated, please contact me through the customer service email address. Weibo and private messages on station B are hardly read. The creation is not easy, and the income is not much. Please raise your hands for copyright phishers!

[The first episode of the sixth season]

"A person named Nanhe in the Chaoyang branch is calling for you."
Liu Qingchun: "Come here."
Nan He: "Hello, I have someone here who came up with him. The reason is that he killed a good friend of myself and left a letter to you. In addition, he seems not very good at talking, looks very strong, but he came. Very weak at the time. When do you have time, I will send you the letter."
Liu Qingchun: "... No need, I will pick it up by myself."

A letter:
Team Liu, I found a way to calm myself down, so I wrote this letter and decided to surrender. I have been living in a dirty sewer during this period of time. I think maybe everyone will forget me, but I can't forget Jasmine.

I went to see their mother and daughter that night, and because of that they were lucky enough to not die. I took them to a safe place, but Ying Xueer (Jasmine) said that she didn’t want to stay in Beijing anymore, and their mother and daughter went to Ningxia , I have the address, and I will leave it to you.

The reason why I went to Nanhe to surrender was because the sewer where I lived was actually near the branch office; second, I knew he had a deadly opponent named Hong Qianzu, who I met in the dance hall, was a mysterious and vicious person. It was him who replaced Sun Meiqi to kill Jasmine, and he and Zhao Huiying knew each other. I think these are useful for protecting their mother and daughter. In addition, please be sure to find them, protect them, and I will provide everything I know.
I am very weak now, maybe my method can only make me sober for a short while, if I don't get through, I still have some clues left where I live.

The second episode of the sixth season (S06E02)


Nan He: Have the procedures been completed?
Intern: It's a bit troublesome, but everything is done. Here are some related materials. Are you sure to go?
Nanhe: I have to go. I have a letter here that you ask the director for a leave by the way, so I won't go by myself.
Intern: OK, but...
Nan He: It's okay, go, and see the director, maybe I will give you a bonus for turning into a regular position. Go.
Interns:… ….
